resources:
SkyLineProjectMenu
/** ----------Coneys--------------------- */
Coney
3 items Coney\'s \n Menu
Cheese Coney Skyline’s classic Cheese Coney is a specially made hot dog in a steamed bun with mustard, covered with our original secret-recipe chili, diced onions and a mound of shredded cheddar cheese. $2.89
Regular Coney Skyline’s classic Coney is a specially made hot dog in a steamed bun with mustard, covered with our original secret-recipe chili. $1.89
Chili Cheese \nSandwich A steamed bun with our original secret-recipe chili, diced onions and mustard topped with shredded cheddar cheese. $4.89
/** ----------Ways--------------------- */
Ways 3 items Ways\nMenu 3-Way Our signature dish – steaming spaghetti covered with our original secret-recipe chili and topped with a mound of shredded cheddar cheese.
4-Way A 3-Way with diced onions or beans.
5-Way A 3-Way with diced onions or beans.
/** ----------Bowls--------------------- */
Bowls 2 items Bowls\nMenu
Loaded Chili Bowl Our secret recipe chili with beans and onions topped with shredded cheddar cheese and sour cream.
Coney Bowl Three of our specially made hot dogs in a bowl of our original secret-recipe chili, topped with shredded cheddar cheese.
/** ----------Buttiros/Chilitos--------------------- */
Burritos & Chilitos 3 items Burritos & Chilito Menu
Original Deluxe Burrito Skyline bean mix in a tortilla, topped with our secret-recipe chili, tomatoes, lettuce, shredded cheddar cheese and sour cream
Chili Deluxe Burrito Skyline Chili in a tortilla, topped with more chili,tomatoes, lettuce, shredded cheddar cheese and sour cream.
Chilito Skyline Chili and shredded cheddar cheese in a tortilla. Add sour cream for additional $.30.
/** -----------Wraps--------------------- */
Wraps 3 items Wraps \nMenu
Chicken Bacon Ranch Diced chicken breast, lettuce, tomatoes, bacon, corn chips, shredded cheddar cheese and ranch dressing.
Buffalo Chicken Spicy buffalo sauce with diced chicken breast, lettuce,tomatoes, shredded cheddar cheese and ranch dressing.
Classic Chicken Diced chicken breast, lettuce, tomatoes,shredded cheddar cheese and chili ranch dressing
/** -----------Fries--------------------- */
Fries 2 items Fries \nMenu
Chili Cheese Fries Crispy french fries covered with our original secret-recipe chili and shredded cheddar cheese.
Cheese Fries Crispy french fries covered with cheddar cheese.
/** -----------Salad--------------------- */
Salads 3 items Salad \nMenu
Greek Lettuce, cucumbers, tomatoes, Kalamata olives, pepperoncinis and feta cheese. Add Skyline’s original-recipe Greek dressing.
Buffalo Chicken Spicy buffalo sauce with diced chicken breast, lettuce, tomatoes and shredded cheddar cheese. Add your choice of dressing.
Garden Lettuce,cucumbers,tomato,croutons and shredded cheddar cheese.
/** -----------Potatoes-------------------- */
Potatoes 3 items Potatoes \nMenu
3-Way Potato
Cheddar Potato
Sour Cream Potato
/** -----------Kids's Meal-------------------- */
Kids Menu 4 items Kids \nMenu
Kids 3-Way A small 3-Way
Kids spaghetti A small dish of our spaghetti topped with shredded cheddar cheese.
Kids Coney Our famous Chili Coney with or without cheese.
Kids Hot Doggy Two of our delicious hot dogs in one freshly steamed bun, with or without cheese.
/** -----------Desserts-------------------- */
Desserts 1 items Dessert \nMenu Funnel Fries
/** -----------Desserts-------------------- */
Beverages 13 items Beverages Soft Drink Pepsi
Chicken Tenders TODO TODO TODO
